spd1.description: Maximum height of the first jump.

spd2.description: Maximum height of the second jump.

spd3.description: Maximum height of the third jump.

charge1.description: Time taken to charge the first jump with psychokinesis.

charge2.description: Time taken to charge the second jump with psychokinesis.

charge3.description: Time taken to charge the third jump with psychokinesis.

espmode.description: Determines if the object requires psychokinesis.

nocontime.description: Time taken to restore control to the player.

Extra.name: A lotus that also acts like a trampoline, for some reason.
